price: Dia (Musa) berkata, "Ya Tuhanku, aku hanya menguasai diriku sendiri dan saudaraku. Sebab itu pisahkanlah antara kami dengan orang-orang yang fasik itu."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ إِلَّا نَفۡسِي وَأَخِيۖ فَٱفۡرُقۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī lā amliku illā nafsī wa-akhī fa-uf'ruq baynanā wabayna al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
